instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2915 NO PPVCORE_S0_CPU
threads.message:
Hello, I have 820-2915 no PPVCORE_S0_CPU
CPUIMVP_VR_ON 3.3v
PPVCORE_S0_CPU diode 0.09v
already replaced U7400

what to try next?

threads.title: 820-2915 NO PPVCORE_S0_CPU
threads.message:
Do you get all voltages from pages 69/70?

Any history available?

Try known good BIOS too...

threads.title: 820-2915 NO PPVCORE_S0_CPU
threads.message:
all voltages from pages 69/70 are present
I tried known good BIOS
no history available, but I found a ripped off component
